entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kirkland Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kirkland Lake 1:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -15.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -20.9°C
Wind: NW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
